flawed_nl_solution:
The lawyer worked 50*2=<<50*2=100>>100 hours out of court
So he worked 100+50=<<100+50=150>>150 hours total
That means the hourly time cost 150*100=$<<150*100=15000>>15000
Adding the upfront cost it was 15000+1000=$<<15000+1000=160000>>160000
His brother paid half so he paid 160000/2=$<<160000/2=80000>>80000
#### 80000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16000, not 160000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
